Verses: 1 avargal Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadi Avargalaip Parisuththappaduththum Poruttu, Nee Avargalukkuch Seyyavendiyadhaavadhu: Oru Kaalaiyum Pazhudhatra Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Therindhukolvaayaaga.
2 pulippillaa Appaththaiyum, Enneyile Pisaindha Pulippillaa Adhirasangalaiyum, Enney Poosappatta Pulippillaa Adaigalaiyum Kodhumaiyin Melliya Maavinaal Panni,
3 avaigalai Oru Koodaiyile Vaiththu, Koodaiyode Avaigalaiyum Kaalaiyaiyum Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Konduvandhu,
4 aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Vaasal Munbaagach Serappanni, Avargalaith Thanneerinaal Kazhuvi,
5 andha Vasthirangalai Eduththu, Aaronukku Ulsattaiyaiyum, Epoththin Keezh Angiyaiyum, Epoththaiyum, Maarppadhakkaththaiyum Thariththu, Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaiyaiyum Avanukkuk Katti,
6 avan Thalaiyile Paakaiyaiyum Vaiththu, Parisuththa Kireedaththaip Paakaiyinmel Thariththu,
7 abishega Thailaththaiyum Eduththu, Avan Thalaiyinmel Vaarththu, Avanai Abisheganjeyvaayaaga.
8 pinbu Avan Kumaararaich Serappanni, Aasaariya Oozhiyam Avargalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaaga Irukkumbadi, Avargalukkum Angigalai Uduththuvaayaaga.
9 aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Idaikkachchaigalaik Katti, Avan Kumaararukkuk Kullaakkalaiyum Thariththu, Ippadiye Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Piradhishtai Pannuvaayaaga.
10 kaalaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaagak Konduvaruvaayaaga; Appozhudhu Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalaik Kaalaiyinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Vaikkakkadavargal.
11 pinbu Nee Andhak Kaalaiyai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththu Vaasalandaiyile Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Adiththu,
12 adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Un Viralinaal Balibeedaththin Kombugalmel Ittu, Matra Raththam Muzhuvadhaiyum Balibeedaththin Adiyile Ootri,
13 kudalgalai Moodiya Kozhuppu Yaavaiyum, Kalleeralin Melulla Savvaiyum, Irandu Kundikkaaigalaiyum, Avaigalinmelulla Kozhuppaiyum Eduththu, Balibeedaththinmel Thagiththuppottu,
14 kaalaiyin Maamsaththaiyum Adhin Tholaiyum Adhin Saaniyaiyum Paalayaththukkup Purambe Akkiniyaal Sutterikkakkadavaai; Idhu Paavanivaaranabali.
15 pinbu Andha Aattukkadaakkalil Ondraik Konduvandhu Niruththuvaayaaga; Adhinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalai Vaikkakkadavargal.
16 andhak Kadaavai Adiththu, Adhin Raththaththaip Pidiththu, Balibeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththu,
17 aattukkadaavaich Sandhusandhaagath Thundiththu, Adhin Kudalgalaiyum Adhin Thodaigalaiyum Kazhuvi, Avaigalai Andhath Thundangalinmelum Adhin Thalaiyinmelum Vaiththu,

18 aattukkadaa Muzhuvadhaiyum Balibeedaththinmel Thagiththuviduvaayaaga; Idhu Karththarukkuch Seluththum Sarvaanga Thaganabali; Idhu Sugandha Vaasanaiyum Karththarukkuch Seluththum Thaganabaliyumaai Irukkum.
19 pinbu Matra Aattukkadaavaiyum Konduvandhu Niruththuvaayaaga; Adhinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalai Vaikkakkadavargal.

20 appozhudhu Andhak Kadaavai Adiththu, Adhin Raththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Aaronin Valadhukaadhu Matalilum, Avan Kumaararin Valadhukaadhu Matalilum, Avargal Valadhukaiyin Peruviralilum, Avargal Valadhukaalin Peruviralilum Ittu, Matra Raththaththaip Balibeedaththinmel Sutrilum Theliththu,

21 balibeedaththin Melirukkum Raththaththilum Abishegathailaththilum Konjam Eduththu, Aaronum Avan Vasthirangalum Avanudaiya Kumaararum Avargaludaiya Vasthirangalum Parisuththamaakkappadumbadi, Avanmelum Avan Vasthirangalmelum Avanudaiya Kumaarar Melum Avargaludaiya Vasthirangal Melum Thelippaayaaga.

22 andha Aattukkataa Piradhishtaiyin Aattukkataavaanadhaal, Adhilulla Kozhuppaiyum Vaalaiyum Kutalkalai Mootiya Kozhuppaiyum Kalleeralinmelulla Savvaiyum Irantu Kuntikkaaikalaiyum Avaikalinmelulla Kozhuppaiyum Valadhupakkaththu Munnandhotaiyaiyum,
23 karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Vaiththirukkira Pulippillaa Appangalulla Koodaiyil Oru Appaththaiyum Enneyitta Appamaagiya Oru Adhirasaththaiyum Oru Adaiyaiyum Eduththu,
24 avaigal Ellaavatraiyum Aaronin Ullangaigalilum Avan Kumaararin Ullangaigalilum Vaiththu, Avaigalaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Asaivaattappadum Kaanikkaiyaaga Asaivaatti,

25 pinbu Avaigalai Avargal Kaigalilirundhu Eduththu, Balibeedaththinmel Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyodu Vaiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagath Thakikkakkadavaai; Idhu Karththarukkuch Seluththappadum Thaganabali.
26 aaronudaiya Piradhishtaiyin Aattukkadaavile Maarkkandaththai Eduththu, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Asaivaattappadum Kaanikkaiyaaga Asaivaattakkadavaai; Adhu Un Pangaayirukkum.

27 melum, Aaronudaiya Piradhishtaikkum Avan Kumaararudaiya Piradhishtaikkum Niyamiththa Aattukkadaavil Asaivaattappadugira Maarkkandaththaiyum Ereduththup Padaikkappadugira Munnandhodaiyaiyum Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga.

28 adhu Ereduththup Padaikkira Padaippaanadhinaal, Isravel Puththirar Paliyidugiravaigalil Avaigale Niththiya Kattalaiyaaga Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Servadhaaga; Isravel Puththirar Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Ereduththup Padaikkira Samaadhaanabaligalil Avaigale Ereduththup Padaikkum Padaippaayirukkavendum.
29 aaronin Parisuththa Vasthirangal, Avanukkuppin, Avanudaiya Kumaararaich Serum; Avargal Avaigalai Uduththikkondu, Abishegampannappattup Piradhishtaiyaakkappaduvaargal.

30 avanudaiya Kumaararil Avan Pattaththirku Varugira Aasaariyan Parisuththa Sthalaththil Aaraadhanai Seyvadharku Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Piravesikkumbodhu, Avaigalai Ezhunaalmattum Uduththikkollakkadavan.
31 piradhishtaiyin Aattukkadaavaik Konduvandhu, Adhin Maamsaththaip Parisuththa Idaththil Vevippaayaaga.
32 andha Aattukkadaavin Maamsaththaiyum, Koodaiyilirukkira Appaththaiyum, Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Vaasalile Pusikkakkadavargal.

33 avargalaip Piradhishtai Pannip Parisuththappaduththumporuttu, Avaigalaal Paavanivirththi Seyyappattabadiyaal, Avaigalai Avargal Pusikkakkadavargal; Anniyano Avaigalaip Pusikkalaagaadhu; Avaigal Parisuththamaanavaigal.
34 piradhishtaiyin Maamsaththilum Appaththilum Edhaagilum Vidiyarkaalam Mattum Meendhirundhadhaanaal, Adhai Akkiniyaale Sutterippaayaaga; Adhu Pusikkappadalaagaadhu, Adhu Parisuththamaanadhu.
35 indhappiragaaram Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyittabadi Ellaavatraiyum Nee Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Seyvaayaaga; Ezhunaalalavum Nee Avargalaip Piradhishtaipanni,

36 paavanivirththikkaaga Ovvorunaalilum Ovvoru Kaalaiyaip Paavanivaarana Baliyaagap Baliyittu; Balibeedaththukkaagap Piraayachchiththam Seydha Pin, Andhap Balibeedaththaich Suththiseyya Vendum; Adhaip Parisuththappaduththumbadi Adhai Abishegam Pannakkadavaai.

37 ezhunaalalavum Balibeedaththirkaagap Piraayachchiththanjeydhu, Adhaip Parisuththamaakkakkadavaai; Balibeedamaanadhu Magaa Parisuththamaayirukkum; Balibeedaththaith Thodugiradhellaam Parisuththamaagum.
38 balibeedaththinmel Nee Baliyidavendiyadhu Ennavenil; Idaividaamal Ovvorunaalilum Oru Vayadhaana Irandu Aattukkuttigalaip Baliyidavendum.
39 oru Aattukkuttiyaik Kaalaiyilum, Matra Aattukkuttiyai Maalaiyilum Baliyiduvaayaaga.

40 oru Marakkaalile Paththiloru Pangaanadhum, Idiththup Pizhindha Kaalpadi Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaagiya Melliya Maavaiyum, Paanabaliyaagak Kaalpadi Thiraatcharasaththaiyum, Oru Aattukkuttiyudane Padaippaayaaga.
41 matra Aattukkuttiyai Maalaiyile Baliyittu, Kaalaiyile Seluththina Bojanabalikkum Paanabalikkum Oththapiragaaram Adhaik Karththarukkuch Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganabaliyaagap Padaikkakkadavaai.

42 unnudane Pesumbadi Naan Ungalaich Sandhikkum Idamaayirukkira Aasarippuk Koodaaraththinudaiya Vaasalaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile, Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Seluththappadavendiya Niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganabali Idhuve.
43 ange Isravel Puththiraraich Sandhippen; Andha Sthalam Ennudaiya Magimaiyinaal Parisuththamaakkappadum.
44 aasarippuk Koodaaraththaiyum Balibeedaththaiyum Naan Parisuththamaakkuven; Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadikku, Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Parisuththappaduththi,
45 isravel Puththirarin Naduve Naan Vaasampanni, Avargalukkuth Dhevanaayiruppen.
46 thangal Naduve Naan Vaasampannumbadi, Thangalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Naan Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Avargal Arivaargal; Naane Avargal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
